description.raw:
the fuel-tools4 bionic build is failing to find msgs5

[![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ignition_fuel-tools-ci-default-bionic-amd64&build=24)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/ign-citadel/job/ignition_fuel-tools-ci-default-bionic-amd64/24/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/ign-citadel/job/ignition_fuel-tools-ci-default-bionic-amd64/24/

even though gzdev was updated today to indicate that it should use the prerelease repos:

* https://github.com/osrf/gzdev/commit/1df14e40e62618da8a4796b93a3c86d73dc1e379#diff-9807c0fe4e9a47c2d8dd3452ec0a69d5R70-R75

I think the fuel-tools compilation script is missing the `GZDEV_PROJECT_NAME` variable, so I've added it to see if that fixes things. Testing:

* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ignition_fuel-tools-ci-default-bionic-amd64&build=25)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/ign-citadel/job/ignition_fuel-tools-ci-default-bionic-amd64/25/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/ign-citadel/job/ignition_fuel-tools-ci-default-bionic-amd64/25/

@{_jrivero_}  I thought this would work, but it isn't. Any ideas?
description.html:
the fuel-tools4 bionic build is failing to find msgs5

https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/ign-citadel/job/ignition_fuel-tools-ci-default-bionic-amd64/24/

even though gzdev was updated today to indicate that it should use the prerelease repos:

  • https://github.com/osrf/gzdev/commit/1df14e40e62618da8a4796b93a3c86d73dc1e379#diff-9807c0fe4e9a47c2d8dd3452ec0a69d5R70-R75

I think the fuel-tools compilation script is missing the GZDEV_PROJECT_NAME variable, so I've added it to see if that fixes things. Testing:

  • https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/ign-citadel/job/ignition_fuel-tools-ci-default-bionic-amd64/25/

@{jrivero} I thought this would work, but it isn't. Any ideas?

title: set GZDEV_PROJECT_NAME in ign_fuel-tools-compilation.bash
